hours_text:
Admission is free. The experience is priceless. The Amon Carter Museum of American Art explores the diversity and complexity of American creativity through our expansive collection and exciting exhibitions.

Construction is taking place on Camp Bowie Boulevard through 2026. Learn how to [access the Carter parking lot](/camp-bowie-boulevard-construction "Camp Bowie Blvd. construction").

## Museum Hours

**Sunday** | noon–5 p.m.  
---|---  
**Monday** | Closed  
**Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday, Saturday** | 10 a.m.–5 p.m.  
**Thursday** | 10 a.m.–8 p.m.  
  
We are closed Mondays, New Year’s Day, Martin Luther King Jr. Day, Memorial Day, Juneteenth, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day.

## Art is for everyone!

With thousands of artworks, exciting new exhibitions, and weekly events and experiences, all for free, there’s always something on for you at the Carter.

Ver video [en español](https://youtu.be/E60UaAyEThk "Los segundos jueves del mes en el Carter").

##  What’s On View? 

Art can change your mood, change your mind, and transform an ordinary day into an extraordinary one.

_ _ [Current exhibitions](/exhibitions)

## Museum Map

[Download a map](/map "Museum Map") of the Museum in English or Spanish.

## Directions & Parking

Free parking is available at the Museum's lot located on Camp Bowie Boulevard. Download a [parking map](https://d2ujpqfu85jxzw.cloudfront.net/website/panth-live/2025-03/2025_carter_parking.pdf "Carter Parking Map") for inf...

##  About the Carter 

**A renowned collection of American art** in the heart of Fort Worth's Cultural District 

_ _ [Our Story](/about/our-story)

##  Featured event 

###  Quiet Hours at the Carter 

Shhhh ... 

On the first Thursday of every month, take a moment to catch your breath, relax, unwind, and enjoy some quiet time among the art at the Carter.

_ _ [Learn more](/events/public-programs/quiet-hours-carter)

##  Helpful Visitor Links 

### [ Carter at Home  Spark creativity and connect with us from your home! Check out our videos, crafts, and art-inspired recipes.  ](/carter-home)

### [ The Collection  The Carter collection celebrates the breadth and depth of American art. Explore over 200 years of creativity.  ](/art-artists)

### [ Plan your visit  **Admission is free.** The experience is priceless. From parking tips to hours, start planning your visit now!  ](/plan-your-visit)
